SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_TIER, MEM_SUMMONER, MEM_POSITION, MEM_TIME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NUM >= 0
AND MEM_TIER like 'IRON%'
AND MEM_TIER like 'BRONZE%'
AND MEM_TIER like 'SILVER%'
AND MEM_TIER like 'GOLD%'
AND MEM_TIER like 'PLATINUM%'
AND MEM_TIER like 'DIAMOND%'
SELECT MEM_LOLID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM}
